description: Try our easy to follow Steak Wrap recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef wrap,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Steak Wrap Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g flank steak, trimmed of excess fat and flattened slightly

recipeInstructions.text: Season steaks generously with pepper. Heat a frying pan over medium to high heat and cook steaks for 3 minutes each side for medium rare. Transfer to a plate to rest for 2 minutes, covering with aluminum foil.

Spread each wrap with 1/2 tsp of wholegrain mustard, followed by salad leaves, zucchini, tomato and one piece of Swiss cheese. Thinly slice steak and divide among wraps. Squeeze over lemon, fold and serve.
